1901950.reference:
Reference  : Shama'il Muhammadiyah 1901950
In-book reference  : Book 28, Hadith 001
English translation  : Vol. 1, Book 28, Hadith 001
1901950.text: Thabit said: “Anas ibn Malik brought out to us a wooden drinking vessel, roughly clamped with iron, then he said: ‘O Ihabit, this is the drinking vessel of Allah’s Messenger (Allah bless him and give him peace)'!”

1901960.reference:
Reference  : Shama'il Muhammadiyah 1901960
In-book reference  : Book 28, Hadith 002
English translation  : Vol. 1, Book 28, Hadith 002
1901960.text: Anas said: "I had given Allah’s Messenger (Allah bless him and give him peace) every kind of beverage to drink using this vessel: water, date juice, honey and milk.”
